actions.name: blog/proofread
actions.description: Fix spelling and grammar errors only - no content changes
actions.output: { corrected: string, changes: Change[], changeCount: number }

actions.name: blog/validate
actions.description: Validate blog post structure, links, and word count
actions.output: { valid: boolean, issues: Issue[], warnings: Issue[], stats: Stats }

actions.name: blog/enhance
actions.description: Add SEO metadata and social preview data
actions.output: { enhanced: string, seo: SEO, socialPreview: Social, readingTime: number }

actions.name: blog/write-draft
actions.description: Generate a blog post draft from a topic
actions.input: { topic: string, style?: string, targetWords?: number }
actions.output: { draft: string, wordCount: number, title: string, sections: string[] }

actions.name: extract/knowledge
actions.output: { summary: string, insights: string[], signals: string[], rating: number }

actions.name: extract/youtube
actions.description: Extract transcript from YouTube video via Fabric
actions.output: { transcript: string, processed?: string, videoId: string }

actions.name: format/markdown
actions.description: Format structured content as clean markdown
actions.input: { content: object|string, template?: string, title?: string }

actions.name: parse/topic
actions.description: Parse topic text into structured topic object
actions.output: { name: string, subtopics: string[], keywords: string[] }

actions.name: social/adapt
actions.description: Adapt content for different social platforms

actions.name: social/post
actions.description: Post content to social media platforms
actions.input: { content: string, platforms: string[], dryRun?: boolean }

actions.name: transform/summarize
actions.description: Summarize text to target word count
actions.input: { text: string, targetWords?: number, style?: string }
